summary: 今天我们来聊聊区块链的layer2，并通过一个实际的项目（cannon），从一个特定角度，看看为什么需要layer2，以及layer2都干了
title: 从cannon的角度理解Layer2：前世今生

summary: About Me Huabing Zhao is a software architect, an Istio Member and an ONAP PTL. He has a solid experience in the information and telecommunication technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country software systems, most of them are still running in production. He loves open source and has been contributing to various open source projects, he is a member
